titleStmt.title: The lives of sundry notorious villains, memorable for their base and abominable actions together with a novel as it really happened at Roan in France.
titleStmt.author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and sold by Sam. Crouch ...,
